column4: On Ubuntu 9.10 I will download an install ATI driver but every time i do it , my computer is need to restart of course but then the computer start op again there are a TTY and is just flashing so i can't write anything.

on boot you usually get a "grub" menu that defaults to the first option listed for booting.. the second option is a "rescue" mode.. go there and you should get a menu to redo your video
